forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Partial clearing late. Low 4C. WSW winds shifting to NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low around 40F. WSW winds shifting to NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
